## RemoteRepository.connect() method

Set a remote repository and connect to the remote repository. A remote repository will be created if not exists.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
connect(repos: nodegit.Repository, credential_callbacks: {
        [key: string]: any;
    }, onlyFetch?: boolean): Promise<string[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  repos | nodegit.Repository |  |
|  credential\_callbacks | { \[key: string\]: any; } |  |
|  onlyFetch | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string\[\]&gt;

## Exceptions

[CannotCreateRemoteRepository](./git-documentdb.cannotcreateremoterepository.md)
